text: Tumaci madata karanyata (purnapane) kanjusa aheta, maga jevha bhaya - dahasatica prasanga yeto tevha tumhi tyanna pahala ki te tumacyakade drsti kendrita karatata ani tyance dole asa prakare garagara phiru lagatata, tya manasasarakhe, jyacyavara mrtyuci murcha aleli asavi, maga jevha bhiti nahisi hote, tevha tumacyasi apalya tiksna jibhene mothamothya gosti bolu lagatata. Dhanace mothe lobhi aheta. Ya lokanni imana rakhaleca nahi. Allahane tyanci sarva karme vaya ghalavili aheta ani ase karane allahakarita phara sope ahe
